challenges: physical maladies due to blocked energy
choosing to channel their creative energy in destructive ways

guidelines: Establish a daily exercise routine to release tension.
Trust and cultivate your intuitive abilities.
Open up to your heart; let your feelings and sensitivity show.
questions: How do I use my creative energy?
In what ways can I create a healthier body?
Can I let go, surrender, and show my vulnerability?
Have I found the courage to be different?
If these questions generate any insights, how might you put these insights into practice?

advice: Live a balanced life, keeping everything in moderation
Take their sensitive nature into account
Engage in energetic methods of healing, such as massage, hypnosis, and visualization
Eat a healthful, grounding diet, including occasional fish or poultry
Engage in a balanced, moderate exercise program, including walking, stretching, or light calisthenics

positive: Unusual physical appearance in the body, eyes, or face
Lower need for sleep than most people, especially when feeling excited or inspired

advice: Balance their mind with their heart
Confront and clear shyness or shame
negative: Charming with strangers but abusive with family or friends

positive: Sexual relationships can become a form of healing when trust and love are present

Work for the highest good of all concerned
